description: Welcome to the Notion Template for Writers!This template, which I took down a while ago due to some issues, is back - and, this time, with a new design option.This template will be your best friend to help you organize your ideas, plot and write your books, and even track your word count and set goals. features: Step by step: If you're new to writing, or need help exploring this template, follow this simple, yet effective guide; Goals: Track your weekly, monthly, quarterly, or yearly writing goals and keep them all in one place; Ideas: Never lose track of any idea with the help of this database. You can even label your ideas to your liking; My novels: Store as many books as you wish, with no limit! See all their details, chapters, scenes, etc.; Word count: Track your words and filter by project or date; Socials: Manage your social accounts with this simple page, where you can save your @, and password, track follower numbers, and more
